name: ChristmasTunes
0:
”Alexa, play Christmas Tunes”
”Alexa, start Christmas Tunes and play Jingle Bells”
”Alexa, start Christmas Tunes and play random”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas tunes
des:
Setup a Christmas ambiance at your place with the following Christmas tunes:
- Ave Maria
- Dance of the Sugar Plum Fairies
- Deck the Halls
- It Came Upon the Midnight Clear
- Jesu, Joy Of Man's Desiring
- Jingle Bells
- Oh Christmas Tree
- Oh Holy Night
- O Little Town of Bethlehem
- Silent Night
- What Child Is This

Just say, "Alexa, ask Christmas Tunes to play Jingle Bells".
Or, for a random song, say "Alexa, start Christmas Tunes and play random".
While the song is playing, you can say "Alexa, play next" to play the next song, or say "Alexa, play previous" to return to the previous song.

priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
